publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6275.3 Liam McArthur: Zero Waste Planâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-6275) in the name of Richard Lochhead, insert at end "; regrets the delay in the publication of the Zero Waste Plan, and recognises the necessity of meeting EU landfill diversion targets in order to avoid potentially punitive fines."
